column6:
The Green Goblin's got it in for the Wall-Crawler. And bad. When he deals Spider-Man a particularly painful defeat, Peter Parker hangs up his web-shooters and locks himself in his room. But how's the hero supposed to beat the villain when he's too scared to take him on? Really. How?,2007,6
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | writer:Chris Kipiniak | inker:Roland Paris | penciller (cover):Patrick Scherberger | letterer:Dave Sharpe
